resources.string: Select to show the Hello Toast
Select to show the Vuzix Toast
Select to show the Blade Toast
Launch Around Content Lock style activity
Show Pop Up Menu style activity
Center Content style means that the View or real estate available is in the center and is locked to that position. The Action menu moves underneath the main UI area.

Popup menu style means that the action menu is hidden, giving you full real estate. The Action menu will "Pop Up" with a Single Tap on the touch pad. To Hide the Action Menu do a two finger tap(back gesture)
Around Content style means that the View or real estate available is AROUND the center of the screen.
The Action menu moves in the CENTER of the main UI area.
